sentences.sContent: ...an eerily prescient comedy about a populist multimillionaire political candidate.
sentences.sCn: ...围绕一位身价数百万的民粹主义政治候选人的一部喜剧，其预见性近乎诡异。

trans.tranOther: If you say that someone or something was prescient, you mean that they were able to know or predict what was going to happen in the future
